name: Zee5 Bot
description: The Telegram bot that can upload the videos to telegram from zee5 links.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

TRACE_CHANNEL.description: The id of a channel to which i need to send the current status

AUTH_USERS.description: Give the id of the owner who can broadcast,  ban, unban, etc

DATABASE_URL.description: Mongodb token for saving the users data

CHUNK_SIZE.description: chunk size that should be used with requests

HTTP_PROXY.description: proxy for accessing youtube-dl in GeoRestricted Areas. Get your own proxy from https://github.com/rg3/youtube-dl/issues/1091#issuecomment-230163061
